description: Deliver Cultural Reintegration Support Services to Indigenous offenders residing at the Lavers House Community Residential Facility (CRF) and Indigenous offenders on parole in the greater Traver area.
full_summary:
### Indigenous Cultural Reintegration Support Services
#### Advance Contract Award Notice

* **Reference Number**: cb-333-75123775
* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-04
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-20
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-03-31

The Correctional Service Canada invites contractors to provide Indigenous Cultural Reintegration Support Services to:

* Indigenous offenders residing at the Lavers House Community Residential Facility (CRF) in Nova Scotia
* Indigenous offenders on parole in the greater Truro, Nova Scotia area

**Services Provided**:

Support services will include:

* Cultural reintegration
* Rehabilitation and re-entry programs
* Technical and professional rehabilitation services

**Requirements and Specifications**:

The contract award notice provides further details regarding the required services, qualification criteria, and contact information for the contracting authority.

**Contact Information:**

To obtain additional information, contact:

Claudia Landry
Email: [claudia.landry@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:claudia.landry@csc-scc.gc.ca)
Phone: (506) 378-8722
Address:
1045 Main Street
Moncton, New Brunswick E1C 1H1
Canada

**Contract Documents:**

Contract documents, including the tender notice and any amendments, can be accessed through the following links:

* English Version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33385/acan---indigenous-cultural-reintegration-support-services---21206-24-4665727.pdf
* French Version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33385/pac---services-de-soutien-a-la-reinsertion-culturelle-autochtone---21206-24-4665727.pdf

Due to the non-applicability of trade agreements, limited tendering, or geographical restrictions, the procurement category is Service (SRV).
